content: changes are necessary to address single paths.  Develop a plan to address the requirements. When you perform the review, document the resources that can be made available if the EDA is used. The resources on the drawers are allocated during a POR of the system and can change after that process. Perform a review when changes are made to your IBM z16, such as adding drawers, PUs, memory, or channels. Also, perform a review when workloads are added or removed, or if the HiperDispatch feature was enabled and disabled since the last time you performed a POR. 9.8.2 Enhanced drawer availability processing To use the EDA, first ensure that the following conditions are met:  The used processors (PUs) on the drawer that is removed are freed.  The used memory on the drawer is freed.  For all I/O domains that are connected to the drawer, ensure that alternative paths exist. Otherwise, place the I/O paths offline. Chapter 9. Reliability, availability, and serviceability 397 For the EDA
